gmeg_explaination.template:
You will be given a sentence showing revisions made for grammar and fluency.

Sentence:
{}

Provide an explanation for all the revisions in the sentence in a bulleted list. Even if you disagree with a revision because it is stylistic or you would have preferred a different revision, you should still explain the revision. However, if you feel a particular revision is truly incorrect, mark the item as 'Not annotatable'. Write 'NA' if not annotatable.
gmeg_explaination.description: Annotators were shown one aligned sentence at a time. For each sentence, we instructed annotators to provide an explanation for all the revisions in the sentence in a bulleted list.
